title: Riot. This is UNACCEPTABLE...

replies.body:
It sounds really strange that you would have to constantly repair to fix these crashes, so I'm curious if there are other culprits here like driver issues.  Especially with a new rig, it's important to make sure that they are up to date so your hardware can render the game properly.  I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help prevent these crashes in the future.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) do a clean reinstall of the game.  Also just in case, make sure to disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) if you recently updated Windows 10, as it's been known to cause some freezing issues.  

It's important to perform these steps as it will be the best way to return to good standing with the system and prevent further penalties!  Let me know if you have any questions.
